'''Heart of the Spring''' is an event item obtained from the [[Wishful Drops]] [[Event]]. It is award when completing Exploration Area in [[Wishful Drops#Endora's Education|Endora's Education]]. It can be used in place of [[Original Resin]] to claim rewards from the [[Rhodeia's Rage]] Challenge.
